name: Burn Free Pain Relieving Gel Single Use Packet 12 Pack/Cools, Soothes, Moisturizes, Relieves Pain/for All Minor Burns Including Sunburn / 12 x 1/8 Ounce
product_description: Burn Free solves the immediate first aid needs for all types of burns by relieving the pain, rapidly removing the heat, and cooling the burn. Burn Free Rescue Pain Relieving gel is viscous enough for it to remain on the burn and not run off, while simultaneously drawing the heat out and up into the gel. The convenience of single dose packets makes Burn Free Pain-Relieving Gel portable and easy to use to treat small burns. Single dose packets are ideal for inclusion in first aid kits at home, restaurants and in the workplace. The 12-pack of 1/8 oz. (3.5g) packets are excellent for use on burns from cooking and welding sparks.

name: Lightning X Products Cooling Burn Relief Gel, 4x4 Inch Trauma Burn Dressing - Box of 20 Pieces
short_description: Foam dressing with cooling gel for fast heat dissipation
Safe for use on children and facial burns
Moistens, cools and soothes
Non-adherent to the burned skin, Non-Toxic
Box of 20 PCS
product_description: Lightning X BD44 burn relief dressing is a hydrogel consisting of 95% de-ionized pure water thickened into a high viscosity odorless gel. Our burn dressing gauze pad is a soft, elastic, open-cell flexible foam and can accommodate swelling or the need to flex joints. With its high water content, Lightning X burn gel cools and soothes by absorbing and dissipating heat, which minimizes skin damage. The gel is clear which makes it easy to assess the healing and severeness of the wound. It is non-stick and will not adhere to the burn. A single application of BD44 dressing is effective first-aid on any type of burn injury. Lightning X sterile burn dressing is lightweight and easily transported and delivers hydrogel to the burn site. Non adherent foam will not shed threads, strands or fibers, keeps wound moist, and provides protection from the elements. ● Sterile trauma hydrogel 4" x 4" burn dressing ● Suitible for burns and scalds ● Moistens, cools and soothes for relief ● Non-adherent to the burned skin and non-toxic ● Simply open, remove, apply and secure with bandage ● Safe for use on children and facial burns ● For major burns, seek immediate medical care ● 4" x 4" foam dressing contains 1.4 ounces (40 grams) of hydrogel ● Box of 20 pieces of LXBD44 Burn Dressing.
